com.pb.sawdust.tabledata.write

Class TextTableWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pb.sawdust.tabledata.write.TextTableWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RuntimeCloseable, TableWriter, java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AsciiTableWriter, DelimitedTextTableWriter

    public abstract class TextTableWriter
extends java.lang.Object
implements TableWriter, RuntimeCloseable
    The TextTableWriter class provides a framework for writing data tables to text.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected java.io.PrintWriter writer
      The print writer which writes the table data.

      • TextTableWriter

        public TextTableWriter(java.io.File file)
        Cosntructor specifying the file to which the table data will be written. The default character encoding will be used.
        Parameters:
        file - The file to which the data table will be written.
        Throws:
        RuntimeIOException - if file is not found or cannot be created.

    • Method Detail

      • writeHeader

        protected abstract void writeHeader(DataTable table)
        Write the table header. This method will be called before any table data is written.
        Parameters:
        table - The data table for which the header is to be written.

      • writeRow

        protected abstract void writeRow(java.lang.Object[] dataRow,
            TextFormat[] format)
        Write a row of data with the specified formats. It can (should) be assumed that the number of row data elements and formats will be equal (i.e. that bounds checking has already been performed).
        Parameters:
        dataRow - The row data to be written.
        format - The formats for each element (column) in the data row.

      • writeFooter

        protected abstract void writeFooter(DataTable table)
        Write the table footer. This method will be called after all table data has been written.
        Parameters:
        table - The data table for which the footer is to be written.

      • writeTable

        public void writeTable(DataTable table)
        Write the data table with default formats. The default formatting is as follows:
        Data Type Format
        DataType.BYTE TextFormat.Conversion.INTEGER
        DataType.SHORT
        DataType.INT
        DataType.LONG
        DataType.FLOAT TextFormat.getPrecisionFormat(TextFormat.Conversion.FLOATING_POINT, 2)
        DataType.DOUBLE
        DataType.BOOLEAN TextFormat.Conversion.BOOLEAN
        DataType.STRING TextFormat.Conversion.STRING
        Specified by:
        writeTable in interface TableWriter
        Parameters:
        table - The data table to write out.

      • writeTable

        public void writeTable(DataTable table,
              TextFormat... formats)
        Write the data table with specified formats.
        Parameters:
        table - The data table to write out.
        formats - The formats to use for each column.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the number of formats in formats does not equal the number of columns in table.

      • close

        public void close()
        Description copied from interface: RuntimeCloseable
        Closes this stream and releases any system resources associated with it. If the stream is already closed then invoking this method has no effect. This is identical to the method prescribed in java.io.Closeable, except it has no checked exception.
        Specified by:
        close in interface RuntimeCloseable
        Specified by:
        close in interface java.io.Closeable
        Specified by:
        close in interface java.lang.AutoCloseable
